string.value: Tum abhi kisi bhi khel me nahi ho...
{0} ne ek game start kiya hai, kripya /join ka upyog kare khel ka anand uthane ke liye... aur shayad marne ke liye :P
{0} ne ek naya game start kiya! /join use kare khaye jaane ke liye!
{0} ne ek chaos game start kiya hai, kripya /join ka upyog kare khel ka anand uthane ke liye... aur shayad marne ke liye :P
{0} ne ek naya chaos game start kiya! /join use kare khaye jaane ke liye!
Abhi tum join nahi kar sakte! Game pahle hi shuru ho chuka hai
Join kar chuke ho tum
1 minute bacha hai /join karne ke liye
{0} seconds bache hai /join karne ke liye
Players kam hai, game cancel ho raha hai
Game shuru ho raha hai, kripya ruke jabtak main sabka roles nirdharit aur database update karta hu
{0} ko ek shoshan ka prayas karne ke liye pratibandh laga diya gaya hai (koi v naam / se start nahi hoga)
{0}, kripya join karne ke liye apna naam badlo
maaf karo, khiladi join karne ki seema adhiktam pahuch gaya hai!
{0} ne game join kiya. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} Kriypya start button par click karo ya {1} start me dabaye taki main tumhe tumhara role PM kar saku. Tum jab tak ye nahi karte, tum game nahi khel sakte!
Tum bhaag nahi sakte! Tum game join karke phas gaye ho! Wapas aao game me... harami!
{0} ki gaand phati aur wo bhaag gaya
{0} players bache hain.
Abe maine tumse kuchh nahi puchha abtak.
Tum khelte hue nahi dikh rahe ho lund ke baal
Main iss naam se kisi khiladi ko nahi khoj pa raha hu!
Ye jawab sahi nahi hai!
{0} {1} ko khana chahta hai .
{0} {1} ko marna chahta hai.
{0} ne lagataar 2 raato ko vote nahi kiya. Bhagwan ki sena ne ise ek bhayanak apradh ke roop me dekha hai, aur {0} achanak mar jata hai. {1}
Abe gaddar, ab tum bhediye ho...
Chunao swikaar kiya jata hai.
\nSeer hai {0}.
{0} Seer tha. Uska chhatra hone ke naate ab tum naye Seer ho bancho.
{0} chhatra the, ab vo {1} ki jagah banne ke liye naye Seer ban rhe hai.
Tumne dekha {0} {1} hai!
Kisko maarna chahte ho?
Kiska pata lagana chahte ho?
Kisko goli maarna chahte ho? {0} goli(ya) bachi hai
Kiske paas jana chahte ho?
Kisko dekhna chahte ho?
Kisko bachana chahte ho?
Kisko khana chahte ho?
Kiska shikar karna chahte ho?
Tumhara role model kaun hai?
Yum apne hisab se kisko pariwartit karna chahte ho?
{0} se discuss karna na bhoole
aur
Tum shaapit ho. Abhi ke liye tum gao wale ho,Lekin agar bhediye ne tumhe khaya, tab tum khud bhediye ban jaoge.
Tum Jasoos ho. Subah ke samay, tum kisi ek playe ka role jaan sakte ho. Lekin - ye karne se, your role could be revealed to the wolves! (40% chance)
Badhai ho! Tum gao ke bevde ho! (jaisa ke kisi ko pata hi nahi...)
Tum sanrakshak devdoot ho. Har raat, Tum kisi player ko bachane ka chunao kar sakte ho. Halanki, agar tum ek bhediye ko chunte ho, wahan 50% chance hai tumhare marne ka bisi.

Tum bandook wale ho. Tumhare paas 2 goliya hai. Subah ke samay, tum kisi player ko marne ka chayan kar sakte ho. Sabko goli ki awaaz sunai degi, aur sab jaan jayenge ke tum bandook wale ho (naki bhediye).

Saali Hawas ki Poojarin NO5! Tu Randi hai. Raat ke wakt, tu doosre khiladi ke pass jaa sakti ho dekhne ke liye vo bhediya hai ki nai. Agar tum bhediye ke pass jaati ho, ya uske pass jaati ho jiske pass bhediya bhi gaya hai, tum marogi. Agar tum bhediye ke ghar jaati ho and bhediya ghar pe nahi rha, tum bach jaogi.
Dhokebaaz! abhi ke liye tum gao wale ho, lekin jab sab bhediye mar jayenge, tab tum bhediye ban jaoge. Agar Seer tumhe dekhta hai, tum shayad use bhediye dikh bhi sakte ho, aur nahi bhi.
TUM BHEDIYE HO!! XD (aish kar madarchod). Har tum kisi ko maarne ke liye chun sakte ho.
Tum Paigambar (Seer) ho. Har raat, tum ek khiladi ka chera 'dekh' sakte ho, aur uski bhoomika jaan sakte ho.
Tum nihayat hi neech kisam ke Gao wale ho, jise khet jotne aur marne ke alawa kuchh nahi aata bc.
Tum Chutiye (tanner) ho. Agar sab tumhe maarne ki saza sunate hain to tum jeet jaoge bhosdike.
Tum Khatarnaak Bachche ho. Ek khiladi chuno, jise tum aona 'role model' banan chahte ho - agar wo mara, to tum bhediya ban jaoge chadarmod.
Tum Dekhnewale ho, tumhe bataya jayega ke (asli) paigambar kaun hai - yahi tumhara kaam hai bhusdi.
Tum Paigambar ke Chhatra ho. Agar asli Paigambar marte hai, tab tum uski jagah loge
Tum Saampradaayik (Cultist) ho. Har raat, tum kisi ek kjhiladi ko saampradaayik banane ka chayan kar sakte ho. Agar sabhi players ant me saampradaayik ban jate hai to wo jeet jayenge budbak.

Tum Saampradaayik Shikari ho, jo panth (Cult) ko gao ke sabhi hutiyon ko pariwartit hone se bachate ho! Har raat, tum ek khiladi ko chun sakte ho. Ahar wo saampradaayikhai to wo marenge bancho. Agar Panth (cult) tumhe marna chahenge to unka sabse naya sadasya marege bhusdi.

Shaam hone ko aayi, sabhi gao wale ek jagah ekatthhe hue, taki wo nirnay le sake kisi ko marne ka (tumhare gaand me dum kaha ke kisi ko akele maarne ka bcio)... Sabke paas {0} seconds hai vote karne ke liye!
Subah ho gayi mamu. Sabke paas {0} seconds hai apne aarop, bachao, ya sirf baatein karne ke liye.
Raat ho gay haramkhoro. Sab sone chale gaye ek thakawat bhare din ke baad. Raat ke khiladi: tumhare paas {0} seconds apna kaam karne ke liye!
Apne apne vote de chuke hai gao wale, aur sandeh ke beecho beech. {0} ben ki loda ko marne ki saza sunai gayi. {1}
Dhang ka nirnaya nai kar paane pe, gao wale apne ghar chale gaye, dimag kharab hote hue sabka chadarmod...
Kuch to gadbad hai Daya :P! Koi gao wala aaya hi nai saza dene..
Gao wale subah ikatthha hue, but {0} nazar nai aaye. Uske ghar gaye toh dekha, {0} ke saare ang bahar nikaale gaye the, ek purana billa unke gale me atkaya gaya tha.
>Subah hoti hai, aur sabne aashcharya se dekha, mandir ke chaukhat pe {0}, devdoot (Guardian Angel) mare pade the.

Jab sab apne ghar se nikle, Unko bandook ke tukde mile... fir pairo ke.. fir ungliyo ke.. fir kuwein (well) me tairti hui, {0} ki lash, jisko bhediyo ne maar diya. Tumne tumhara bandookwala kho diya bcio.
Subah subah gao wale uthe, {0} ke tukde nazar aaye jo ek ouija board pe pade the bhavishya ke patto (tarot card) ke sath. Bhosdike Paigambar (Seer) mar chuka hai.
Sab uthe toh jalte hue daaru aur lakdi ki badbu aai... Madhushaala me aag lagi thi!!!! Aag bujhane ke baad {0} ke bache hue hisse mile, jo faade gaye the...
As the sun rises above the village, the villagers find the corpse of {0} sitting over a Ouija board, but with a deck of... Bicycle playing cards? WHAT A FOOL!
Jaise hi sab subah uthe, unko ek bekar badbu aai. Badbu ke piche gaye toh {0} mila jise chithde ud chuke the, aur sar gayab tha. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}.
Badi gandi badbu aa rhi hai {0} ke ghar se... gao wale dekhne gaye toh ek laash dikhi vedi pe... Ek saampradaayik (Cultist) ko shikari ne maar diya!!
Sab subah ekathhta hote hai, Lagta hai ki raat ko kuch nahi hua.
Bhediye tumhe khane aaye. Shaapit hone ke naate, tum bhi ek bhediye ho abse!
Baaki Bhediye: {0}
{0} ko khaya gaya... lekin wo shaapit tha, aur bhediya ban gaya! Naye saathi ke liye khushiya manao bancho!
Are! Bhediye tumhe khane aaye. NOMNOMNOMNOM
Are nahi! {0} bhevda tha! Ab tum bevde ho, aur kal raat hamla nahi karte sakte bancho...
Bhediye ne tumhe kha liya.
Tumne {0} ki jaan bachai (pata nahi kyun bachaya)...
{0} pe hamla nahi hua tha, isliye tumne zyada kuchh nahi kiya...
Tumne {0} ko bachana chaha, par wo ghar pe nahi tha!
Devdoot picchhli raat tumhe dekh raha tha aur hamlawaro ko maar bhagaya
Randi ne galti ki aur ghar me baithi rah. {0} has been eaten by the wolves!
Ajeeb hai! {0} Ghar pe nahi thi...koi khaan nahi hai tumhare liye...
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho thode maze karne ke liye, dekha toh bhediya tha waha. Tum maare gaye.
{0} kal raat galat ghar me ghus gayi! Us randi ke bache hue hisse mandir ke darwaze pe laga diye lohe ke sariya (iron rod) se. Bura hua :(
0} {1} ke ghar gayi, thode maze karke tanaav utarne ke liye. Magar, usne dekha ki ek bhediya {1} ko kha rha tha! Bhediya fatak se {0} ke taraf mud ke kooda aur... {0} maare gaye.
Tumne dekha{0} bhediya nahi hai, aur puri raat tumhari jam kar chudai hui (ahhh ahhh)
Thoda andhera tha, toh tum itne aasani se dekh nai paye, magar achanak raat ko tum jaag jaate ho, tumhe randi chodte hue... Dono apna apna kaam nipta lete ho, fir vo chupke se bhaag jati hai...
Tumne {0} ko taak-jhaak karte hue dekha! Vo jaasoos hai!
Tumhari jaasoosi ne dikhayi ki {0} {1} hai!
Aisa lag rha hai ki {0} HIV positive ho gaya randi chodne ke baad! Bandookwale ne apna badla le liya. {1} mar chuke hai.
Achanak, ek goli ki awaaz aayi. Gao walo ne dekha ki {0} {1} ke laash pe khada tha, uske sar par abhi tak bandook tane hue. {2}
Bhediya jeet gaya!
Bhediye jeet gaye!
Gao wale jeet gaye!
Are nahi! Tumne Chutiya ko maarna chaha! Chutiya game jeet gaya bancho!
Bache hue zinda khiladi, kirdar aur team:
{0} ne {1} ko pariwartan karne ka chayan kiya.
{0} ko tumhara ganda kaam karne ke liye bheja gaya hai, aur {1} ko badalne gaye... magar, vo saampradaayik shikhari (Cult Hunter) nikla! {0} mar gaya!
{{0} tumhare ghar aaya tumhe maarne.... magar tumne ek talwar ghusa di uske sar me. ek saampradaayik (Cultist) mar chuka hai... {1} bacha hai!
Panth (Cult) ne tumhe badal diya hai! tum ab ek saampradaayik (Cultist) ho. Har doosri raat, tumhe mauka milega doosre khiladi ko apne panth me lene ke liye.
Saampradaayik: {0}
{0} ne Panth (Cult) join kar liya hai/
{0} ko tumhara ganda kaam karne ke liye bheja gaya, aur {1} ko badalne gaye wo... magar koi ghar pe nai tha!
Sab bhediye mar gaye, aur jo khiladi bache the unko saampradaayik (Cultist) bana diya gaya hai... Panth jeet gaya!
Tum {0} ko maarne gaye, magar vo pehle hi mar chuka tha!
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho, aur tumne dekha wo koi anjaane bhagwaan se prarthna kar rha tha... Tumne jaldi se apni talwar uske seene me daag di. Ek saampradaayik (Cultist) maara gaya!
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho, magar vaha kuch ajeebo-garib nai ho rha tha. Vo saampradaayik (Cultist) nahi the, toh tum ghar laut gaye.
{0} ke prernastrotra (Role Model) mar gaye! Gusse me, woh bhediye ban gaye!
{0} mar gaye! Gusse me, woh bhediye ban gaye! Tumhare naye saathi hai: {1}

Tum ek mazdoor ho. Agar koi aur mazdoor hai, tumhe pata chal jayega. Nahi toh, tum gao wale ho.
Jaise gao wale uthe, unhone dekha ki patthharo me ek mazdooor ka sar ghusa pada tha, sab jagah khoon uda tha. Tumhara ek mazdoor mar chuka hai! -- {0}
Mazdoor hain: {0}
Tumhara naya gand dost jab {0} ke ghar gaya unko badalne, tab uski gand fat gayi jab usne purje, khun aur bhediye ke kuchh baal wahan dikhe. Aur uski gand fatne ke baad wapas aagaya.
Bhediye {0} ka ghar use khane jaate hain, aur waha ek lamba kaala-kalutha aadmi ko dekhte hai, jo hathiyarbandd tha. SanrakshakDevdoot ne sabko maar bhagaya, aur tum haar kar laut jaate ho.
Tumne {0} ko bheja {1} ko badalne ke liye, lekin unka vishwas bahut jabardast tha, isliye tum usko badal nahi sake :
{1}, {0} ke naam se pahle hi join kar chuka hai. Kripya apna naam change kare join hone ke liye.

Tum {0} ke ghar gaye thode maze karne ke liye... magar jaise hi tum jaa rhe the, tumne ek moorti dekhi, jise acchi tarah nai chhupaya gaya tha, ek baju ke kamre me, ajeeb si roshni aane lagi vaha se...
tha
Sab subah uthte hai, dekhte hai ki {0} aas paas nai hai... Woh dekhte hai ki {0} ke bache kuche hisse pade the uske ghar pe.
Sab subah uthe, toh unhe {0} ki laash ke bache kuche hisse dikhe, jo pichhli raat maut ke ghaat utara gaya...

mar chuka hai

Tum pahle se game me ho! ({0})

Tumhara group abhi katar (queue) me hai. Position: {0} / {1}
Kshama karo, Main abhi ek chhota sa maintenace break le raha hu, tum abhi game start nahi kar sakte. {0} maa chuda raha hai \n @greywolfdev pe jaiye apni marwane
Kshama karo, adhikta samavarti (concurrent) khel ({0}) ho gaya hai. \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
{0} ek pasandeeda group hai, aur isliye katar se hatt gaya hai!
Koi game nahi chal raha hai. Naya game shuru karne ke liye /start game, aur chaos game shuru karne ke liye /startchaos ka istemal kare.
Sirf group admin iss command ko istemal kar sakta hai.
Iss game ke baad, Main maintenance ke liye ja raha hu..
Iss game ke baad, Main ek Update ke liye kuchh samay band ho raha hu (automated).
UserId ashakt (null) tha. Kya tum isko ek jawab ke roop me bhejna chahte ho?

{0} admin nahi hai!
{0} ko admin list se hataya gaya.
Language badalkar {0} rakha gaya
Koi paigambar nahi hai!
Samay samapt hua!

Tum Kaamdev (Cupid) ho. Darti par ek kachchha, ek dhanush aur do teer ke saath bheje gaye ho. Tumhe do khiladiyo ko chunna hoga, jinhe tum janam-janam ke premi banana chate ho. Agar ek marta hai, to dusra bhi dukh se mar jayega.

Tum Judwa (Doppleganger) ho. Legend kehte hai ki tumhare purwaj bhes badalne wale the, aur jo wo chahte the usko chayan kar sakte the. Tumhe unki kuchh shaktiyan wirasat me mili hai. Ek khiladi ko chuno, jab wo khiladi marega, Tum uske role me badal jaoge.

Tum shahri Shikari ho. Tum theek se sote nahi, aur tum kabhi bhai apne rifle ke bagair sone nahi jaoge. Agar tum marte ho, tum kisi aur ko maarne ka chayan kar sakte ho. Agar tumhe khaya jata hai, tumko ek mauka milega bhediye ko marne ka, lekin tum kisi khiladi ko nahi chun sakte.
Tum serial killer. Haal hi me tum Asylum se bhaag nikle, tumhara goal hai sabko marne ka. Har raat, tum ek khiladi ka shareer apna collection me rakh sakte.
Tum pyaar se maare gaye. {0} ki yaad tumhare dil se kahbhi nahi udegi. Agar tum me se koi ek marta hai, doosra bhi uske gam me mar jayega. Agar ek jeet jata hai to doosra bhi jeet jayega.
Kaamdevka teer tumko lagta hai! Tum {0} ke pyaar me pagal ho gaye ho! Agar wo mara, tum bhi maroge. Agar dono me se koi ek jeet ta hai to dono jeet jaoge
Gao wale tumhe phasi dena chahte hain! Ye tumhara aakhri mauka hai, marte-marte kisi ka gand maar do!
Jaise hi fanda tight hota hai {0} apna pistol uthane ke liye chat patata hai, lekin samay par nahi utha pata, Aur gardan tootne ki zordar awaaz ke saath uski maut hoti hai...
{0} apni pistol bahar nikalta hai aur bheed ko dekhta hai... aur kisi ko maarne ka nirnay nahi le pata. Wo mar jata hai hai apna bhaagya swikaar karke...
Jaise hi fanda tight hota hai, {0} pistol nikalta hai, nishaana lagata hai, aur {1} pe goli chalata hai, jaise hi uske pairo tale zameen khisakti hai! {1} gir jaata hai, mrit (dead). {2}
Tumhara khoon hua hai! Apne antin kshann me tum kisi ko goli maar sakte ho... Jaldi Karo!
{0} ka phatna bahut jabardast tha, itna jabardast ke wo apna sidearm tak bhi nahi pahuch saka, khoon ka sailab ke becho beech pada raha...
Jab {0} apna antim saansele raha tha, wo kisi ko gole marne ka chaya nahi kar saka... aur apna bhaagya swikaarta hai.
{0} zameen pe girta hai, marte hue.... lekin apne pistol ko liye hue, aur {1} pe goli chalata hai, jise goli theek uske dono aankho ke beech lagti hai. {2}
Bhediyo ne pichhli raat Shikari pe hamla karna chaha, lekin shikari unme se ek ko maarnne me safal raha, marte-marte! {0} mar chuka hai (bhediya)
Bhediyo ne pichhli raat Shikari pe hamla karna chaha, lekin shikari bhediya {0} ko apne rifle se maarne me safal raha.
Bhediye der raat achhe naashte ki talaash me nikle, lekin usna swagat ek pagal khooni dwara hua! {0} ladai me mara gaya!

{0} ke liye ek shaant raat lag raha tha, lekin wo galat tha. Gao wale subah ekatthhe hue aur dekha ke {0} ka sar se pao tak chithdeude hue the, aur uska liver bhi gayab tha... Serial Killer ne ek baar fir hamla kiya! {1}
Tumne {0} ki shareer ko apne collection me rakhna chaha, lekin devdoot ne tumhari gaand faad daali! Aaj raat kisi ki hatya nahi hui...
Panth ne {0} ko bheja gaya {1} ko badalne ke liye, lekin ek goli chalne ki awaaz aati hai aur {0} ki laash khidki se udte hua bahar girti hai! {0} mar gaya....

Panth ne {0} ko bheja gaya {1} ko badalne ke liye, lekin iske wipreet {0} ka sahreer khidki se udta hua bahar girta hai, uske shareer ke har hisse me chaaku chubhone ke nishaan the! KAISA LUND HAI! {0} mar gaya....

{0} {1} ke ghar me jhaankta hai, dheere se darwaza kholta hai, aur achanak hi ek pagal randwa chhuri se uska swagat karta hai!!! {1} {0} ke shareer ke har organ me chhuri chubhota hai warnmala kram (alphabetical order) me, pura samay barbad karte hue! {0} mar gaya D:
Tumne Serial Killer ki gaand bachani chahi, lekin usne tumhari gaand mar li 69 baar! Tum mar gaye ho....
Tum {0} ke ghar jaate ho apni Hawa ka Pyaas bujhane. Thodi der tak chudai hone ke baad {0} chhuri nikalte hai aur tumhe chubhona shuru karta hai, Chuttado ke jaisa haste hue! Tum mar chuke ho....
Gao wale {0} ke shareer ko dekhta hai, jo anginat chaku ke ghaav ke saath janta ke warg me mrit padi hai. {0} mar chuki hai
Judwa {0} ab tumhari tarah mazdoor ban gaya hai!
{0} mar gaya, aur tum mazdoor me badal gaye. Tumhare teammates (agar koi hai) to: {1}
Judwa {0} ab tumhari tarah ek saampradaayik ban gaya hai!
{0} mar gaya, aur tum saampradaayik me badal gaye. Tumhare teammates (agar koi hai) to: {1}

{0} mar gaya, aur bhediye me badal gaya. Tumhare teammates (agar koi hai) to: {1}

Ek ajeeb sa chutad ne tumhe panth banana chaha, lekin tumhare mann ki vishwasne uski gaand faad di

Subah hoti hai, bache hue do gao wale gao ke chowk pe jate hain. {0} {1} ko dekhta hai, uske chehre pe badi muskurahat aati hai, chhuri nikalta hai, aur {1} ko mar deta hai.
Sabhi gao wale mare ja chuke hain... laasho ke alawa kuchh nahi rakha. Iss round koi koi nahi jeeta, gidhdho (vultures) ke alawa...

Jaise hi suraj ugta hai, {0} aur {1} bahar nikalte hai gao me. {0} apni chhuri nikalta hai, aur {1} pe lapakta hai. {1} bandook nikalt hai aur {0} ke chehre pe goli chalata hai. {0} girta hai, {1} ke shareerme chaku marrte hue. Dono mar gaye, gao khaali hai, koi wijeta nahi bana...

Haar
Khiladi {0} ko maara gaya hai {1} baar vote na karne ke liye pichhle 24 ghanto me.
Tumhara kaam asaan hai - zinda rehne ki koshis karo. Har din, tumhe bhediye ko maarne ka mauka milega.

Tum paigambar ho. Is role me, har raat, tum ek khiladi ka chayan kar sakte ho, aur uska role tumhe pata lag jayega. Apne role ka sahi istemaal karna: Agar tumne bataya ke tum paigambar ho, Bhediye tumhe khaan chahenge!
